resume.title: Professional Experience
resume.description: I have gained practical experience through internships and projects.

bulletPoints: Leading the development of scalable web applications using modern technologies.
Overseeing system architecture and implementing best coding practices to ensure maintainability.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including UI/UX designers, backend developers, and project managers.
Mentoring junior developers, conducting code reviews, and optimizing application performance.
Integrating third-party APIs, security enhancements, and database optimizations for efficient system operations.

jobs.jobTitle: Web Developer in PHP and Laravel
bulletPoints: Developed web applications using PHP and Laravel for various sectors, including government, corporate, and CRM systems.
Collaborated with design teams to implement responsive UI and integrated external APIs such as Bunny Net, Stripe, and Zoom.
Contributed to the development of a Learning Management System (LMS) to enhance e-learning experiences.
Guided interns on coding best practices and provided QA support, ensuring bug-free applications.
Assisted in creating security audit reports for government websites, ensuring compliance with security standards.

jobs.jobTitle: Full Stack Web Developer in PHP Laravel (Intern)
jobs.location: XDezo Technology, Ratna Chowk, Pokhara-7, Pokhara 33700, Nepal
bulletPoints: Collaborated with a team of four developers to design and develop custom websites.
Worked on three major projects, contributing to both frontend and backend development.
Developed responsive UI using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, ensuring user-friendly interfaces.
Utilized PHP and Laravel for backend development, building efficient and scalable web applications.
Participated in code competitions and  workshops, ensuring code quality and adherence to best practices.
Served as College Representative (CR) and Operations Lead at Code for Change Pokhara, driving community engagement and event execution.
Assisted in member recruitment, onboarding, and fostering student involvement in various initiatives.
Planned, coordinated, and executed major events, workshops, and initiatives while ensuring cross-functional team collaboration.
Managed event logistics, registrations, and outreach, ensuring smooth execution and evaluating outcomes.
Contributed to reports and feedback collection, improving operations and aligning projects with the organization's goals.
